about_the_game:
Welcome to the world of FireWorks Inc., an action-packed puzzle adventure set in the not-too-distant future where the planet has reached the point of no return. In a world plagued by regular fire outbreaks due to climate change, the overstretched Fire Department struggles to keep up with the increasing number of emergency calls. Step into the boots of a firefighter in a privatized fire station owned by the capitalist masters of Fireworks Inc, where the fate of the station rests on your shoulders.

Missions

Take on challenging missions, strategically rearrange furniture, extinguish fires and rescue civilians to earn the funds needed to keep the station afloat. You choose which missions you take on and who survives. Will you be the hero the station needs, or will you lead it to financial ruin?

Challenge

With stylish pixel graphics and a light-hearted yet tactical approach, FireWorks Inc. delivers puzzling gameplay with a dash of humor. Immerse yourself in the chaotic world of firefighting, make split-second decisions, and experience the adrenaline-pumping challenges of managing a privatized fire department.

Will you rise to the occasion and save the day, or will your station succumb to the flames of bankruptcy? The fate is in your hands!

content_descriptors.notes: FireWorks Inc. includes multiple depictions of "work accidents", where people die in an exaggerated and cartoonish way.

short_description: FireWorks Inc. is a 2D Puzzle game where you kick furniture and throw people out of windows. Peoples homes are burning and they need YOU to save them. Luckily for you people are worth literal money in the future, which is perfect since you need to gather all the cash you can to achieve your goals.
